description: In addition to the Room Event fields, State Events have the following additional fields.
title: State Event

state_key.description:
A unique key which defines the overwriting semantics for this piece
of room state. This value is often a zero-length string. The presence of this
key makes this event a State Event. The key MUST NOT start with '_'.

prev_content.title: EventContent
prev_content.description: Optional. The previous ``content`` for this event. If there is no previous content, this key will be missing.
